Posts.Content: I am worried about a dark spot I have near my sternum. [right Breast cancer 12/08; proph left mastectomy 3/10] How did they find it?  Sorry for  your diagnosis.
Posts.Title: Breast Cancer Stage IV to the Skin

Posts.Content: Your breast surgeon could probably explain it better but if I understand what you are saying there are 3 zones the lymph nodes from the breast go to.  Maybe what your are saying is you have a node in one of the 3 zones that the dr's biospy when they do the sentinal node biopsy.  It is done determine  how many nodes are involved beyond the mass in the breast.  They use this to determine treatment.
Posts.Title: Just got diagnosed with breast cancer

Posts.Content: Get a breast surgeon to give you an opinion.  My breast cancer looked like cancer to the rad dr.  She did the needle biospy which came back negative.  Long story but finally I had the mass removed and it was cancer.  I had that breast removed and ended up with 3 positive nodes. Recently I had a mammo done on the other side with 2 new lesions and calcifications.  I had the breast removed and the path report did not show any cancer.
Posts.Title: Breast cancer concern!!
